attributes.action: openly condemn the hypocritical and absurd decision by UK university academics to boycott Israel academy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One can only wonder why Israel was singled out as a target of boycott. Do British academics assume academical freedom in any of Middle East tyrannies (like Iran, Syria, Egypt, Saudia)? Do they assume that Iran nukes could be done without Iran universities?
However they don't see any issue with these tyrannies and their terrorist offshoots in Palestinian authority and Levanon. 
After 100 years of promoting and fighting for democracy around the world British ended with siding with totalitarians and open terrorists against open and democratical society of Israel (needless to say, the one one among 400M-strong Middle East community).
Smears not good, smears as primitive anti-Semitism...
